subject: Re: Reminder: Order #SSN4761, how did it go?
description_text:
I didn t received the package. 


Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Essenkahn KM,    We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused. Our German warehouse is currently out of stock, but we expect to restock today. We will ship your order via DHL.
Hi Essenkahn KM,  Hello, on which platform did you purchase it? The order number could not be found.

Hello, 

I ordered the products from the original website "https://www.simsonn.com/". I think the order number it is Order #SSN4761 . Is there any chance that the pedals will arrive by Wednesday? My son would be very happy to have them for Christmas. The order it's from Dec 13th.

Best Regards, Happy Holiday's
This is how it look my Order page, maybe you can find the order easier.
Hi Essenkahn KM,    We are shipping your order from our warehouse in Germany, but your address is missing the postal code. Please provide it as soon as possible.

Hello, 
This is my postal code: 041838.
Thank you

Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone

Hi Essenkahn KM,    We apologize, but we have already shipped your order and updated the shipping notification. The postal code we retrieved is 041839, which may result in delivery failure. Please contact DHL for clarification. Thank you.  Merry Christmas!
Hello. My brackets for pedal arrived today. Very good quality.  But from the pedals i don t have any news from Dec 14 2025
Hi Essenkahn KM,     The U-shaped bracket should have already arrived. The tracking update for the pedals may be delayed due to the holiday.
ID 号为 8481 和 9825 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单8481  
      主题: Order number 098224P248757 Tracking  
      描述:  
 Hello, 
   
   
  I purchased some pedals and a haptic mount from you on Dec 13th. I only received tracking for the mount, not the pedals. I'm not in a hurry, I just wanted to ask if you could help me with an approximate delivery time. I'm excited about these pedals.  
   
   
 
Have a nice day.

合并来自工单9825  
      主题: Re: Order #SSN4761, how did it go?  
      描述:  Hello. I didn t received either of product. The pedals it s in germany for 10 days.   
 
 
Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone

 Hello Petre,  We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel. I recevied the brackets but the pedals it is in Germany from dec. 24. I order on Dec 13.


Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone
Hi Essenkahn KM,     Please don't worry. Our warehouse staff in Germany have already emailed DHL to investigate the matter. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.
